CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Select_Co_Designers__c, "Crystal Hopson"), "Crystal Hopson" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Select_Co_Designers__c, "Kelly Martinelli"), "Kelly Martinelli" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Select_Co_Designers__c, "Lisa Zolfarelli"), "Lisa Zolfarelli" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Select_Co_Designers__c, "Shelley Botts"), "Shelley Botts" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Select_Co_Designers__c, "Trevor Andersen"), "Trevor Andersen" + BR(), NULL)
CustomField.label: Co-Designer(s)
